distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libcgroup fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-14348: Fix daemon that creates /var/log/cgred with mode 0666 (bsc#1100365).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libcgroup up to and including 0.41 creates /var/log/cgred with mode 0666 regardless of the configured umask, leading to disclosure of information.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
